message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its immense value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,800,000.  I'm confident that this product will exceed your expectations and deliver exceptional returns.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,500,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer. While $1,500,000 is certainly a respectable figure, the true value of this product is significantly higher. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,700,000. I believe this revised price reflects its worth while still offering you a great deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $1,700,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1,550,000. I believe this is a fair price for the product.

Bob, we're getting closer. I understand your perspective on the price, and I'm committed to finding a solution that works for both of us. To demonstrate my commitment, I'm willing to accept $1,625,000  This is my final offer, as I believe it reflects the true value of the product while still providing significant value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not convinced that $1,625,000 is the right price. I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I think $1,575,000 is a fairer price for the product. I hope we can meet in the middle.
